description:
The first quarter of 2025 is over, and I'm showing you my progress in the #WarhammerChallenge. With the completion of Zikkit's Tunnelpack, I've already managed to fill a complete row, and in this showcase post you can gaze over the result.

The post Showcase: Skaven Zikkit’s Tunnelpack appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: Skaven Zikkit’s Tunnelpack

description:
From box art to battlefield, the EU's newly proposed Toy Safety Regulation is poised to transform the wargaming landscape. With tabletop miniatures classified as toys in the TSR, and a set of new rules for imitation firearms for toys, painting models might never be the same. Learn how this legislation will affect manufacturers, retailers, and even your own collection in gaming stores and events.

The post News: New EU toy safety regulation might change the way we paint our minis appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: News: New EU toy safety regulation might change the way we paint our minis
